parameters.name: VORuDir
parameters.description: True for V direction, false for UDirection

parameters.name: DoConstrain
parameters.description: True if you want to constrain these new sketch entities, false if not

parameters.name: SkipHoles
parameters.description: True if you want to skip the holes in this surface, false if not
